meanings.definition: Four times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The quadruple amount of candy made the children very happy.
meanings.sent2: She bought a quadruple pack of pencils for school.
meanings.sent3: The quadruple scoop of ice cream was almost as big as his head!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement quadrupled when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The quadruple rainbow in the sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: To make or become four times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: They decided to quadruple the recipe to feed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to quadruple its production next year.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally quadrupled the number of balloons for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to quadruple in volume as the joke went on.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden seemed to quadruple overnight.
